title: The Ermine
description: The onyx weighted head of this model is trimmed with the prized winter coat of organic, free-range stoats.

title: The Dinner Jacket
description: With a .925 silver weighted head and dressed in a luxurious tuxedo, all fish scramble punch this jig's dance card for the last song of the night!

title: The Peacock
tag: Imbued with the widom of Chandragupta Maurya.
description: A peridot head is decorated with genuine feathers of Indian peafowls so that the dazzling eye spots hypnotize the fish, causing them to fly right into your boat!
